def gcd(a,b):
	if(a==0):
		return b
	elif (b==0):
		return a
	else:
		if (a>b):
			return gcd (a%b,b)
		else:
			return gcd (a,b%a)
			
t=int(raw_input())
for asd in range (t):
	n,q=map(int,raw_input().split())
	a=map(int,raw_input().split())
	pre=[0]*n
	pre[0]=a[0]
	for i in range (1,n):
		pre[i]=gcd(pre[i-1],a[i])
	suf=[0]*n
	suf[n-1]=a[n-1]
	i=n-2
	while (i>=0):
		suf[i]=gcd(a[i],suf[i+1])
		i-=1
	for ass in range(q):
		l,r=map(int,raw_input().split())
		l=l-1
		r=r-1
		if (r==n-1):
			print pre[l-1]
		elif (l==0):
			print suf[r+1]
		else:
			print gcd(pre[l-1],suf[r+1])
